sentences.en: Candela : Unit of luminous intensity of a light source.
sentences.cn: 烛光: 光源发光强度的单位.

sentences.en: Former Roma and France international Candela is continuing his career in the Italian capital.
sentences.cn: 前罗马边后卫法国国脚坎德拉在意大利首都继续着自己的职业生涯.

sentences.en: Luminous intensity is indicated with the symbol I and its unit of measurement is the candela.
sentences.cn: 其定义符号为I 以及其测量单位表示为烛光。

sentences.en: This, by Candela Cort for Pedro Miralles, redefines the heel.
sentences.cn: 这样的鞋后跟未免太前卫了.

trans.tran_en: the basic SI unit of luminous intensity; the luminous intensity in a given direction of a source that emits monochromatic radiation of frequency 540 × 1012 hertz and that has a radiant intensity in that direction of () watt per steradian
